Name: Get App Builder Updates
Description: System Workflow to Check for PAA Updates

Actions.Description: Check if app is marked as Development
Clear Updates table before getting new entries
Clear Hotfixes table before getting new entries
Clear Specific Updates table before getting new entries
Clear Add-ons table before getting new entries

ActionParameters.Name: SqlQuery
ActionParameters.Value:
INSERT INTO dbo.PlantAnApp_Updates (Title, DnnFriendlyName, Version, CreatedDate)
VALUES (@Title, @DnnFriendlyName, @Version, GetDate())

ActionParameters.Name: SqlQuery
ActionParameters.Value:
INSERT INTO dbo.PlantAnApp_Updates_Hotfixes (FeatureType, ChangeType, Date, Version, DnnFriendlyName, Details, InstalledVersion, ProductID, Link, State, CreatedDate, Priority)
VALUES (@FeatureType, @ChangeType, @Date, @Version, @DnnFriendlyName, @Details, @InstalledVersion, @ProductID, @Link, @State, GetDate(), @Priority)

ActionParameters.Name: SqlQuery
ActionParameters.Value:
INSERT INTO dbo.PlantAnApp_Updates_SpecificUpdates (Product, Version, Info, Link, State, CreatedDate, Priority)
VALUES (@Product, @Version, @Info, @Link, @State, GetDate(), @Priority)

ActionParameters.Name: SqlQuery
ActionParameters.Value:
INSERT INTO dbo.PlantAnApp_Updates_Addons (DnnFriendlyName, Title, Version, Description, Link, CreatedDate)
VALUES (@DnnFriendlyName, @Title, @Version, @Description, @Link, GetDate())
